description.full: This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a touch event (touchesBegan, touchesMoved) happens we record the touch information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.

methods.name: ofTouchEventArgs
methods.parameters: ofTouchEventArgs::Type type, float x, float y, int id

page.document:
#class ofTouchEventArgs

##InlineDescription

##Description

This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a touch event (touchesBegan, touchesMoved) happens we record the touch information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.

page.raw:
#class ofTouchEventArgs


<!--
_visible: True_
_advanced: False_
_istemplated: False_
_extends: ofEventArgs_
-->

##InlineDescription






##Description

This class is integrated into the openframeworks events system. When a touch event (touchesBegan, touchesMoved) happens we record the touch information inside an object of the class. Used to send event messages. In the new openFrameworks release we can find a very illustrative example about how to use events in openFrameworks.
